Incredible game. I've never played a game that has such an interesting & memorable atmosphere, gameplay & story. Like Half-Life, HL2 was obviously way ahead of its time and that's coming from someone who first played it in 2022. So many memorable levels, will definitely be coming back to this one.

Oyun hikaye konusunda olduk√ßa iyi bir i≈ü √ßƒ±karmƒ±≈ü. 2004 tarihinde √ßƒ±kmƒ±≈ü bir oyuna g√∂re grafik, fizik, hikayede s√ºr√ºkleyicilik gibi y√∂nlerden olduk√ßa ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±. Bu dediklerimi oyunun diƒüer b√∂l√ºmleri (Episode 1 ve 2) i√ßinde s√∂yl√ºyorum. Bana g√∂re Valve'nin bu zamana kadar yapmƒ±≈ü olduƒüu en iyi oyunlardan biridir.

This is the best game i have ever had the pleasure of experiencing

Aunque el motor gr√°fico de Source sea una maravilla anticuada, me permito destacar el gran logro en las expresiones de todo tipo entre los personajes principales para la √©poca, el hecho de que la Inteligencia Artificial es mucho mas atenta a tus movimientos y comprobar que, canonicamente, G-Man tiene un severo caso de asma en el doblaje espa√±ol.

La historia no es f√°cil de comprender a simple vista pero b√°sicamente nos situamos en el futuro despu√©s de los eventos ocurridos en Black Mesa, aproximo un lustro despu√©s quiz√°s, pero vamos a resaltar que la humanidad ha sucumbido ante los seres extraterrestres gracias a la inundaci√≥n de portales, poca defensa y gran avance tecnol√≥gico que dichos enemigos poseen.

Desde este juego se marc√≥ una nueva era no solo entre los fan√°ticos de la saga, tambi√©n para los futuros grandes juegos que provendr√≠an de dicho motor gr√°fico como lo fueron por ejemplo Left for Dead y Counter-Strike, un aspecto demasiado positivo en lo que a Valve se refiere. Esto no quiere decir que tampoco se dej√≥ de lado la asombrosa trama que pose√≠a el primer juego, la impulsa mucho m√°s all√° hasta el punto que sea necesario realizar m√°s cap√≠tulos, afortunadamente, la saga continua con historias igual de enganchantes como Half-Life Alyx.

Sin duda, este juego es un antes y un despu√©s para muchos gamers, ya no es solo escapar de un apocalipsis inminente en una base del gobierno, para mi tambi√©n signific√≥ el miedo a un futuro inminente donde las m√°quinas, los agentes externos y la propia ambici√≥n del hombre quiso modificar la historia, junto con todo lo que nos hace humanos.

No Vamos a Ravenholm. 10/10
Even this game has been out for a decade or so its still one of the greatest single player adventure game of all time.
O melhor jogo da minha vida

You don't need to play Half-Life to play Half-Life 2 and it's episodes. This game works fantastically as a sequel, and also as a self contained story. The graphics still hold up, although it is rough around the edges. For today's standards, I mean. With a few minor adjustments here and there, you have a full triple-a modern game with amazing shooting mechanics, a physics engine that makes most modern games cry and a story that'll grab you by your (insert genital here) and drag you across it's entire story. Where the hell is Half-Life 3, Valve?!

It's rare that a sequel is better, let alone good. Half-life 2 is clearly an exception. Even as old as it is, I had a lot of fun blasting my way through combine, and managing not to pee myself in Ravenholm! If you aren't having as much fun as ole' Grigori, you're doing it wrong.
I just realised why I loved this game 20 years ago. I just realised that I still love it even after all this time. Damn there are not many games which you could really ENJOY! :))
